es.internal

Class Teacher

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.internal.Teacher

  • class Teacher
extends java.lang.Object
    Teacher which creates Rules from natural language sentences.

      • findRuleIndices

        private int[] findRuleIndices(java.util.List<java.lang.String> tokenList)
        Finds the indices of the input and output tokens in the given token list.
        Parameters:
        tokenList - the token list to find indices from
        Returns:
        the indices of the input and output tokens in the given token list, respectively.

      • makeTaughtRule

        private java.util.Optional<Rule> makeTaughtRule(java.util.List<java.lang.String> tokenList,
                                                int inputIndex,
                                                int outputIndex)
        Makes a taught rule from the given token list and indices of the input and output tokens.
        Parameters:
        tokenList - the token list
        inputIndex - the index of the input token
        outputIndex - the index of the output token
        Returns:
        an Optional object containing the taught rule if the given indices are valid, otherwise an empty Optional object
